Just the codecs?: yes, basicly - the music players already installed should play mp3 and WMA files, so long as you have installed the codecs for it.  I also installed some other players, though
basically, yes, and I agree with ad - mplayer is one of my favorites.
the thing to remember is that different players use different codecs, so I installed the w32codecs, as well as the gstreamer0-10-plugins, and libxine-extracodecs.
